titles.title: A bill for the relief of Walter Chang.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named State Department employee in full satisfaction of any claim for separate maintenance allowance for the educational needs of his son for which he was not reimbursed because of an unintentional failure to comply with filing requirements.
